meanings.sent1: The team of divers completed their dives with grace.
meanings.sent2: The dives into the pool were impressive to watch.
meanings.sent3: The dives of the dolphins entertained the audience at the aquarium.
meanings.sent4: The dives of the birds into the water were like synchronized ballet.
meanings.sent5: The dives of the whales were a majestic sight in the ocean.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present of dive
meanings.sent1: He dives into the water with a splash.
meanings.sent2: She dives gracefully into the pool every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat dives for the toy mouse with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The sun dives below the horizon, painting the sky in hues of orange.
meanings.sent5: The athlete dives for the finish line, giving it her all.

meanings.sent1: Diving into the adventure, they discovered hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The swimmer is diving into the pool for practice.
meanings.sent3: The chef is diving into the recipe, adding a pinch of salt.
meanings.sent4: The artist is diving into creativity, exploring new techniques.
meanings.sent5: The student is diving into the books, eager to learn.
